original_text: Go there to enjoy time with the Lord your God. Take with you your children and your servants. Also take with you the Levites who live in your towns. Remember that they have not received any land for themselves, as you have.
korean_text: 너희와 너희의 자녀와 노비와 함께 너희의 하나님 여호와 앞에서 즐거워할 것이요 네 성중에 있는 레위인과도 그리할지니 레위인은 너희 중에 분깃이나 기업이 없음이니라

sentences.original_text: Go there to enjoy time with the Lord your God.
sentences.korean_translation: 거기에 가서 너희 하나님 여호와와 함께 즐거운 시간을 보내라.

sentences.original_text: Take with you your children and your servants.
Also take with you the Levites who live in your towns.
sentences.korean_translation: 너희 성읍에 사는 레위인들도 데리고 가라.

sentences.original_text: Remember that they have not received any land for themselves,
sentences.korean_translation: 그들이 자신들을 위한 땅을 받지 못했다는 것을 기억하라.
